Name: ``telescope``
Description: (str) Telescope name; one of LAT, SATP{1-6}.

Name: ``wafer_slot``
Description: (int) Index within optics tube where each wafer is installed.

Name: ``stream_id``
Description: (str) The stream_id associated with the each wafer.

Name: ``det_x``
Description: (float, mm) x coordinate of detector’s mechanical position and orientation in the full optics tube.

Name: ``xi``
Description: (float, radians) xi coordinate of the detectors approximate position and orientation, as projected on sky, relative to the boresight, in the xi-eta coordinate system.  This assumes standard boresight rotation; i.e. perfect co-rotation for the LAT, and zero-corotation for a SAT.
